name: XWUI Rating Component
description: Star/icon rating input component for displaying and collecting ratings. Supports configurable maximum rating, half-star ratings, readonly and disabled states, and various sizes. Useful for reviews, feedback, and rating systems.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

readonly.description: Whether the rating is readonly (display only)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the rating

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

label.description: Label text to display with the rating
